image: resized_images/Some Other Places of Pilgrimage on Venketachal Mountain.png
text:
All the sages then requested Sutji to tell about some other places of pilgrimage situated on Venketachal mountain.
 Sutji replied---There are about one hundred and eight holy places situated on Venketachal mountain.
 Among all these holy places, six are considered to be capable of bestowing salvation---Swami pushkarini, Akash ganga, Papvinashan, Panduteerth, Kumar dharika teerth and Tumbu teerth.
title: Some Other Places of Pilgrimage on Venketachal Mountain
